reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app collects various types of data from its users.
reply.reference: We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to or collect information that you voluntarily give us via the Website or other direct contact from you. URL: http://www.allhealthtv.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information such as account information, device information (including IP address and device identifier), transaction information, browser information, communication information, and financial account numbers.

content: Device information (including IP address and device identifier)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy document outlines various types of data collected by the app, including personal information related to accounts, devices, transactions, browsers, communication, and financial details.
reply.reference: Personal information is any information that we can use to identify, locate or contact you. Some examples of personal information we collect include: Registering for an account on our website; Subscribing to any communications from us or managing your preferences with us; Your Financial Account numbers when transacting with us; Interacting with our Website, other Services; Transaction information about how you interact with us such as account information, computer and mobile device information and push notification services you request; Device Information: such as your IP address and an anonymous device identifier. URL: http://www.allhealthtv.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to opt out of certain data collection and request the deletion of their data.
reply.reference: If you are a California resident, you have the right to opt out of the 'sale' of your personal information to 'third parties.' We do not sell personal information to third parties but we do transfer certain personal information to third parties in order to provide the Services through the Website which the law permits. You may also designate an authorized representative to make data subject rights requests on your behalf. Unless the law requires otherwise, your authorized representative must provide contact details for you so that we can verify that you did in fact authorize the representative. Upon such confirmation, we will. URL: http://www.allhealthtv.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares user information with third parties like Google Analytics, credit card processors, customer service providers, and order fulfillment services.
reply.reference: We may also work with third parties to provide some Services on our Website. In connection with those Services, you are deemed to consent to us sharing User Information with third parties who provide services including, but not limited to, credit card processing, customer service, promotions, and order fulfillment. These third parties do not have any right to use User Information or information shared with them beyond what is necessary to assist in providing the Services. You consent to our sharing of User Information with these third parties. URL: http://www.allhealthtv.com/privacy-policy
